mapper.select: select film_id, film_name, film_director, film_actor, film_type_id, film_brief, film_video_url, film_surface_url, film_years, film_create_time, film_update_time, film_user_id, film_watch_count, film_brief_simple, film_score_id, film_good, film_classify_id from movie_film where film_id = #{filmId}
mapper.insert: insert into movie_film(film_name, film_director, film_actor, film_type_id, film_brief, film_video_url, film_surface_url, film_years, film_create_time, film_update_time, film_user_id, film_watch_count, film_brief_simple, film_score_id, film_good, film_classify_id) values (#{filmName}, #{filmDirector}, #{filmActor}, #{filmTypeId}, #{filmBrief}, #{filmVideoUrl}, #{filmSurfaceUrl}, #{filmYears}, #{filmCreateTime}, #{filmUpdateTime}, #{filmUserId}, #{filmWatchCount}, #{filmBriefSimple}, #{filmScoreId}, #{filmGood}, #{filmClassifyId})

insert into movie_film(film_name, film_director, film_actor, film_type_id, film_brief, film_video_url, film_surface_url, film_years, film_create_time, film_update_time, film_user_id, film_watch_count, film_brief_simple, film_score_id, film_good, film_classify_id) values
(#{entity.filmName}, #{entity.filmDirector}, #{entity.filmActor}, #{entity.filmTypeId}, #{entity.filmBrief}, #{entity.filmVideoUrl}, #{entity.filmSurfaceUrl}, #{entity.filmYears}, #{entity.filmCreateTime}, #{entity.filmUpdateTime}, #{entity.filmUserId}, #{entity.filmWatchCount}, #{entity.filmBriefSimple}, #{entity.filmScoreId}, #{entity.filmGood}, #{entity.filmClassifyId})

insert into movie_film(film_name, film_director, film_actor, film_type_id, film_brief, film_video_url, film_surface_url, film_years, film_create_time, film_update_time, film_user_id, film_watch_count, film_brief_simple, film_score_id, film_good, film_classify_id) values
(#{entity.filmName}, #{entity.filmDirector}, #{entity.filmActor}, #{entity.filmTypeId}, #{entity.filmBrief}, #{entity.filmVideoUrl}, #{entity.filmSurfaceUrl}, #{entity.filmYears}, #{entity.filmCreateTime}, #{entity.filmUpdateTime}, #{entity.filmUserId}, #{entity.filmWatchCount}, #{entity.filmBriefSimple}, #{entity.filmScoreId}, #{entity.filmGood}, #{entity.filmClassifyId})
on duplicate key update film_name = values(film_name), film_director = values(film_director), film_actor = values(film_actor), film_type_id = values(film_type_id), film_brief = values(film_brief), film_video_url = values(film_video_url), film_surface_url = values(film_surface_url), film_years = values(film_years), film_create_time = values(film_create_time), film_update_time = values(film_update_time), film_user_id = values(film_user_id), film_watch_count = values(film_watch_count), film_brief_simple = values(film_brief_simple), film_score_id = values(film_score_id), film_good = values(film_good), film_classify_id = values(film_classify_id)
mapper.update:
update movie_film
film_name = #{filmName},
film_director = #{filmDirector},
film_actor = #{filmActor},
film_type_id = #{filmTypeId},
film_brief = #{filmBrief},
film_video_url = #{filmVideoUrl},
film_surface_url = #{filmSurfaceUrl},
film_years = #{filmYears},
film_create_time = #{filmCreateTime},
film_update_time = #{filmUpdateTime},
film_user_id = #{filmUserId},
film_watch_count = #{filmWatchCount},
film_brief_simple = #{filmBriefSimple},
film_score_id = #{filmScoreId},
film_good = #{filmGood},
film_classify_id = #{filmClassifyId},
where film_id = #{filmId}
